root.name: PixelJunk 4am
root.description: OverviewPixelJunk 4am is a music game developed by Q-Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment America for the PlayStation 3 platform.PixelJunk 4am, previously known as PixelJunk lifelike, is a new type of music visualizer which makes use of the PlayStation Move’s interactivity and the sound functionality of the PlayStation 3. For the first time ever, experience the synaesthesia of “playing” with your favorite music with your friends! Q-Games had previously made visualizers for the PlayStation 3, but they were built into the OS. Baiyon, a major contributor to PixelJunk Eden, is again original artwork and over 40 minutes of original music for .Supports 1-2 Players.GameplayBy the move controller side to side or up and down the player alters the sound of the track being played. Going closer and farther away from the players screen alters the sound as well.Pressing the four buttons (circle, triangle, x, and square) on the device changes the tracks.Unlike more traditional games, 4 am is much more free-formed activity. It has no goals or objectives.
